keyword: how many calories in small cucumber
title: How Many Calories in a Small Cucumber?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in small cucumber, including full nutrition breakdown per serving, macros, and simple tweaks for your diet.
h1: How Many Calories in a Small Cucumber?
assumptions: Raw, unpeeled, average small size (~150 g); fresh and crisp.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, size, ripeness, and growing conditions. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A small cucumber provides about 23 kcal, with low carbs and good hydration.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a small cucumber?
faqs.a: Approximately 23 kcal for one small (~150 g) raw cucumber.

faqs.q: Is a small cucumber low carb?
faqs.a: Yes, about 5.4 g carbs total, with 1.5 g fiber.

faqs.q: What nutrients are in a small cucumber besides calories?
faqs.a: Low protein (1 g), negligible fat (0.2 g), and 0 mg cholesterol.

faqs.q: Does peeling a cucumber change calories?
faqs.a: Slightly; peeling removes some fiber and minor calories, reducing to ~21 kcal.

faqs.q: How does cucumber size affect nutrition?
faqs.a: Larger cucumbers scale up proportionally; a medium (~300 g) has about 45 kcal.
